document.docAuthor: Guanilo, Alberto Daniel, Moraes, Gilberto José De & Knapp, Markus
document.masterDocTitle: Phytoseiid mites (Acari: Phytoseiidae) of the subfamilies Phytoseiinae Berlese and Typhlodrominae Wainstein from Peru, with descriptions of two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Phytoseiid mites (Acari: Phytoseiidae) of the subfamilies Phytoseiinae Berlese and Typhlodrominae Wainstein from Peru, with descriptions of two new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Dorsal shield 364 ( 340–380 ) long, 258 ( 245–265 ) wide; j 1 28 ( 26–30 ), j 3 45 ( 42–48 ), j 4 38 ( 34–40 ), j 5 42 ( 35–45 ), j 6 53 ( 41–59 ), J 2 62 ( 46–69 ), J 5 13 ( 12–13 ), z 2 41 ( 34–47 ), z 3 47 ( 33–55 ), z 4 53 ( 41–61 ), z 5 45 ( 37– 50 ), Z 4 70 ( 55–77 ), Z 5 58 ( 48–62 ), s 4 56 ( 49–62 ), s 6 70 ( 60–77 ), S 5 67 ( 55–71 ), r 3 34 ( 30–37 ), R 1 28 ( 17– 34 ); distances between ST 1 -ST 3 56 ( 52–58 ), ST 2 -ST 2 61 ( 60–65 ) and ST 5 -ST 5 74 ( 70–78 ); ventrianal shield 118 ( 115–123 ) long, 81 ( 75–88 ) wide at level of ZV 2 and 79 ( 75–83 ) wide at level of anus; JV 5 66 ( 60–72 ); movable cheliceral digit 27 ( 26–28 ) long, with 1 tooth; fixed cheliceral digit 25 ( 24–26 ) long, with 3 teeth; calyx of spermatheca 21 ( 20–25 ); Sge
IV 22
( 20–24 ), Sti
IV 26
( 20–29 ), St
IV 42
( 36–45 ). Chaetotaxy: genu
II - 2
, 2/ 0, 2 / 0, 1 (in a female from Sunampe, Chincha, Ica, 2, 2 / 1, 2 /0 on one side); genu
III - 1
, 2/ 1, 2 / 0, 1 .

Previous records. Antigua , Brazil , Colombia , Costa Rica , Galapagos, Guadeloupe , Jamaica , Les Saintes, Marie-Galante, Martinique , Mexico , Nicaragua , Saint-Martin , USA and Venezuela .

Remarks. The females collected in this study agree with the measurements of the holotype given by
Chant and Yoshida-Shaul ( 1983 )
.
